title: Gregg Popovich reportedly not expected to return to Spurs this season, future uncertain after suffering stroke
description: It's been a tough week for the Spurs.
author: Yahoo Sports
excerpt: It's been a tough week for the Spurs.
text: Gregg Popovich will miss the entire season for the Spurs. (Photo by PATRICK T. FALLON/AFP via Getty Images)Gregg Popovich will not return to the San Antonio Spurs this season, according to ESPN's Shams Charania.The Spurs head coach's future is reportedly uncertain as he recovers from a stroke he suffered in November. He had been out indefinitely since then.San Antonio Spurs' Hall of Fame coach Gregg Popovich is not expected to return this season, and his future is uncertain as he recovers from a mild stroke suffered in November, league sources tell ESPN. pic.twitter.com/EekHlDa8NI— Shams Charania (@ShamsCharania) February 23, 2025This article will be updated with more information.
html:
Gregg Popovich will not return to the San Antonio Spurs this season, according to ESPN's Shams Charania.

The Spurs head coach's future is reportedly uncertain as he recovers from a stroke he suffered in November. He had been out indefinitely since then.

San Antonio Spurs' Hall of Fame coach Gregg Popovich is not expected to return this season, and his future is uncertain as he recovers from a mild stroke suffered in November, league sources tell ESPN. pic.twitter.com/EekHlDa8NI

— Shams Charania (@ShamsCharania) February 23, 2025

This article will be updated with more information.
